br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.Scene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Json.Serializable

    public class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Json.Serializable
    A Scene is an object which represents a narrative sequence within the story. Each Scene has some text, written in a specified language, a background music, and is displayed on the screen on top of a background image. Some of them also have a set of choices, thus bifurcating the story. That is why it is necessary to specify which is the next Scene.
